item.title: 英伟达预测令人工智能反弹前景黯淡，美股期货下跌
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）发布的营收预期低于分析师的最高预期，加剧了市场对人工智能热潮能否持续的担忧，美股期货随之下滑。【原文：US stock futures slid after Nvidia Corp. gave a revenue forecast that fell short of the highest analyst estimates, fueling concerns over the sustainability of the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 技术面与库存和利比亚争夺市场，石油维持两日跌势
item.description: 由于技术障碍阻碍了美国库存下降和利比亚生产中断带来的涨幅，石油在连续两日下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a two-day drop, as technical barriers stymied gains from a decline in US stockpiles and disruptions to Libyan production.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。英伟达（Nvidia）营收超预期但低于最高预期，中国经济增长前景被下调，新兴市场债券反弹。【原文：Good morning. Nvidia’s revenue beats estimates but falls short of the highest forecasts, China’s growth outlook gets cut and emerging-market bonds stage a rebound. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 卢拉的航空公司救援计划获巴西下议院批准
item.description: 巴西立法者批准了一项期待已久的航空业财政援助计划，预计将为陷入困境的航空公司提供 50 亿雷亚尔（约合 9.14 亿美元）的信贷。【原文：Brazilian lawmakers approved a long-awaited financial aid plan for the airline sector that is expected to provide 5 billion reais ($914 million) in credit for troubled carriers.】

item.title: 英伟达令人失望，亚洲股市将下滑：市场综述
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）令人失望的财报打压了科技股的前景之后，亚洲股市周四将追随美国股市走低。【原文：Stocks in Asia are poised to track their US peers lower on Thursday after underwhelming earnings from Nvidia Corp. dampened the outlook for tech stocks.】

item.title: 澳航为声誉受损付出代价
item.description: 早上好，我是乔治，我在悉尼为您播报今早的头条新闻。今日必读：- 澳大利亚通胀降温，但降温速度不够快- 澳洲航空利润下滑- 英伟达股价下跌，因营收预期不佳【原文：Good morning, it’s Georgie here in Sydney with this morning’s top news for you.Today’s must-reads:• Australian inflation cools, but not fast enough• Qantas profit dips• Nvidia shares fall as revenue forecast underwhelms】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构计划对私人信贷风险进行压力测试
item.description: 澳大利亚银行业监管机构计划对本国金融部门进行压力测试，以进一步了解私人信贷资金流动对其他市场部门的影响。【原文：Australia’s banking regulator plans to stress test the nation’s financial sector to shed more light on the impact of private credit capital flows on other market segments.】

item.title: 销售下滑，Big Lots 考虑申请破产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，非价格家居用品零售商大乐购公司（Big Lots Inc.【原文：Off-price home goods retailer Big Lots Inc. is contemplating a potential bankruptcy filing after years of sales declines, according to people with knowledge of the plans.】

item.title: 造船商奥斯塔尔支持美国证券交易委员会对其股东进行处罚
item.description: 奥斯特有限公司（Austal Ltd.）表示，该公司支持美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）的一项计划，即向那些 "能够证明自己因 "为美国海军造船夸大收益的会计计划而 "蒙受损失 "的股东发放该公司被处以的 2400 万美元罚金。【原文：Austal Ltd. said it supports a plan by the Securities and Exchange Commission to distribute a $24 million penalty it’s been hit with to shareholders “who could show they suffered” a loss as a result of an accounting scheme designed to inflate earnings from its shipbuilding for the US Navy.】

item.title: 墨西哥中央银行将 2024 年 GDP 增长预测下调至 1.5%
item.description: 在去年第四季度开始的经济放缓之后，墨西哥央行下调了 2024 年和 2025 年的经济增长预期。【原文：Mexico’s central bank cut its growth forecast for 2024 and 2025 following an economic slowdown that started in the fourth quarter of last year.】

item.title: ParaFi Capital 筹资 1.2 亿美元，收购其他加密货币基金股份
item.description: ParaFi Capital 是一家总部位于纽约的数字资产管理公司，其支持者包括 KKR & Co.的联合创始人亨利-克拉维斯（Henry Kravis），该公司从包括 Theta Capital Management 和 Accolade Partners 在内的投资者那里筹集了 1.2 亿美元。【原文：ParaFi Capital, a New York-based digital asset manager that includes KKR & Co. co-founder Henry Kravis among its backers, raised $120 million from investors including Theta Capital Management and Accolade Partners.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行正在洽谈聘用巴克莱交易员 Chiapparoli
item.description: 据知情人士透露，法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）正在洽谈从巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）聘请意大利交易员恩里科-奇帕罗利（Enrico Chiapparoli）到米兰担任高级职务，因为投资银行正在欧洲争夺人才。【原文：Societe Generale SA is in talks to hire Italian dealmaker Enrico Chiapparoli from Barclays Plc for a senior role in Milan, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as investment banks compete for talent in Europe.】

item.title: 兴登堡目标公司 Tingo 未回应美国证券交易委员会的欺诈诉讼
item.description: Tingo Group Inc.是一家金融科技公司，曾被卖空者举报，其首席执行官被联邦法官判定犯有欺诈罪，因为他们没有回应美国证券交易委员会指控他们夸大财务业绩的诉讼。【原文：Tingo Group Inc., a financial technology company that was the subject of a short-seller report, and its chief executive officer were found liable for fraud by a federal judge after they failed to respond to a US Securities and Exchange Commission lawsuit accusing them of a overstating financial results.】

item.title: 卢拉希望增加天然气供应，巴西国家石油公司计划抑制天然气回注
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）负责人周三表示，该公司计划尽可能减少天然气回注，以应对政府为增加燃料供应所做的努力。【原文：Petrobras plans to reduce natural gas reinjection where it can in response to the government’s efforts to boost supplies of the fuel, the the head of the state-controlled oil company said Wednesday.】

item.title: 英伟达是牛市的支点
item.description: 这是一个相当不错的股市。想想它在过去 15 年中的韧性吧。从对量化宽松政策下恶性通胀的担忧，到2019年的鲍威尔支点，从大流行病停摆的恐慌，到美联储的加息运动—尽管经历了一次又一次的考验，但市场还是完好无损地出现了。【原文：This has been quite the stock market. Think about its resilience over the past 15 years. From worries about hyperinflation amid quantitative easing, to the Powell Pivot of 2019, through the panic of pandemic shutdowns to the Fed’s rate-hike campaign — despite test after test, the market has emerged intact.】

item.title: 亿万富翁超级微型公司首席执行官的财富自 3 月份以来缩水 66
item.description: 周三，超微电脑公司（Super Micro Computer Inc. 10-K delay）董事长查尔斯-梁（Charles Liang）的净资产减少了 10 亿多美元，结束了其财富从 3 月份高点下滑三分之二的疯狂历程。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc.’s 10-K delay erased more than $1 billion from Chairman Charles Liang’s net worth Wednesday, capping a wild ride that’s seen his fortune slump by two-thirds from its March high.】

item.title: 德意志银行牵头为赌场设备 M&A 公司完成 43 亿美元债务交易
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）将牵头发行 43.25 亿美元的债券和贷款，为两家赌场设备公司的收购提供资金，在阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Deutsche Bank AG will lead a $4.325 billion bond-and-loan offering to help finance the buyouts of two casino-equipment firms that had planned to merge before Apollo Global Management Inc. swooped in with a $6.3 billion bid.】

item.title: 瑞银称美国大选将对信贷产生行业层面的影响
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）认为，美国总统大选的结果可能会对信贷市场产生微观而非宏观的影响。【原文：The outcome of the US presidential election will likely impact credit markets on a micro level rather than a macro one, according to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 关闭的费城艺术学校收到紧急债券清偿要求
item.description: 今年 6 月突然关闭的费城私立艺术大学面临债券持有人要求立即偿还 5000 多万美元债务的要求。【原文：The University of the Arts, the private college in Philadelphia that abruptly closed its doors in June, faces a demand by its bondholders for immediate repayment of more than $50 million in debt.】

item.title: 莫雷纳誓言不急于司法改革，墨西哥比索反弹
item.description: 墨西哥比索从近两年的低点反弹，因为下议院执政党即将上任的领导人表示，国会不会匆忙通过一项有争议的改革国家司法机构的提案。【原文：The Mexican peso rebounded from an almost two-year low after the incoming leader of the ruling party in the lower house said a controversial proposal to overhaul the country’s judiciary won’t be rushed by congress.】

item.title: 房地产下滑加剧，瑞银下调中国经济增长预期
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）下调了对中国今明两年经济增长的预期，理由是房地产市场的低迷尚未见底，程度超出预期。【原文：UBS Group AG downgraded its forecast for China’s growth for this year and the next, citing a deeper-than-expected property market slump that’s yet to see a bottom.】

item.title: 基本金属在需求担忧和美联储利率不确定性中回落
item.description: 在美元走强、需求担忧挥之不去以及美联储宽松货币政策路径不确定的情况下，基本金属止跌反弹。【原文：Base metals snapped their rallies amid a strong dollar, lingering demand worries and uncertainty about the Federal Reserve’s monetary easing path.】

item.title: 阿联酋石油服务供应商计划今年进行该国最大规模的首次公开募股

item.title: 国际货币基金组织团队将于下周访问乌克兰进行预算和贷款审查
item.description: 国际货币基金组织将于下周与乌克兰官员会面，审查这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的预算前景，并决定是否从 156 亿美元的援助计划中再拨付 11 亿美元。【原文：The International Monetary Fund will meet with Ukrainian officials next week to review the war-torn country’s budget outlook and decide whether to disburse the next $1.1 billion from a $15.6 billion aid program.】

item.title: 卡塔尔据称是俄罗斯德国石油公司资产的最后竞标者
